state: Get ready to pick stuff up and put it in places, because you've just entered TextWorld! Here is your task for today. First off, if it's not too much trouble, I need you to go south. And then, make an attempt to venture south. Okay, and then, make an effort to travel west. Once you get through with that, make an attempt to travel north. And then, travel north. Then, try to move west. And then, take a trip north. Once you get through with that, go to the north. With that accomplished, travel west. Okay, and then, head west. Okay, and then, make an attempt to travel south. Next, attempt to travel south. After that, venture east. Then, recover the stick of butter from the floor of the bathroom. And if you do that, you're the winner! -= Chamber =- I am sorry to announce that you are now in the chamber. Let's see what's in here. You see a gleam over in a corner, where you can see a mantelpiece. Wow, isn't TextWorld just the best? Unfortunately, there isn't a thing on it. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unguarded. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unblocked. > -= Chamber =-0/1
next_state: -= Canteen =- You find yourself in a canteen. A normal one. You begin to take stock of what's here. You see a plate. Does this look like anything mentioned in the instructions? Unfortunately, there isn't a thing on it. You think about smashing the plate to bits, throwing the bits in a fire, etc, until you get bored. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unguarded. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going south. There is an unblocked exit to the west. > -= Canteen =-0/2
